steps.name: $("open") https://demoqa.com/books
$("webdriver") create()
Given  I open Book Store
$("open") https://demoqa.com/books
When  I follow Login Link
$("by text: Login") scroll to()
$("by text: Login") should be(visible)
$("by text: Login") click()
And  I input "Ronny" to userName field
$("By.id: userName") should be(visible)
$("By.id: userName") set value(Ronny)
And  I input "123Ron321&" to password field
$("By.id: password") should be(visible)
$("By.id: password") set value(123Ron321&)
When  I click the Login button
$("[class='btn btn-primary']") scroll into view(true)
$("[class='btn btn-primary']") should be(visible)
$("[class='btn btn-primary']") click()
Then  I am on the Profile page
$("By.xpath: //div[text() ='Action']") should be(visible)
$("[class ='rt-tr-group'].snapshot(5 elements)[0]") should be(visible)
$("[class ='rt-tr-group'].snapshot(5 elements)[1]") should be(visible)
$("[class ='rt-tr-group'].snapshot(5 elements)[2]") should be(visible)
$("[class ='rt-tr-group'].snapshot(5 elements)[3]") should be(visible)
$("[class ='rt-tr-group'].snapshot(5 elements)[4]") should be(visible)
And  I see the Profile Book Catalog empty
$("[class ='rt-tr-group'].filter(not empty: attribute value="" and exact text "")") should have(size(0))
When  I follow the Book Store Link
$("By.xpath: //*[text()='Book Store']") scroll into view(true)
$("By.xpath: //*[text()='Book Store']") should be(visible)
$("By.xpath: //*[text()='Book Store']") click()
Then  I am on the Book Store Page
$("[class='main-header']") should be(visible)
$("[class='main-header']") should have(text "Book Store")
When  I click the "Git Pocket Guide" Title Link
$("By.xpath: //*[text()='Git Pocket Guide']") scroll to()
$("By.xpath: //*[text()='Git Pocket Guide']") should be(visible)
$("By.xpath: //*[text()='Git Pocket Guide']") click()
Then  I am on the Profile Book Detailed Information Page
$("by text: Add To Your Collection") scroll into view(true)
$("by text: Add To Your Collection") should be(visible)
And  I see the detailed information about "Git Pocket Guide" book
$("By.xpath: //*[text()='Git Pocket Guide']") should be(visible)
When  I click the Add To Your Collection button
$("by text: Add To Your Collection") scroll into view(true)
$("by text: Add To Your Collection") should be(visible)
$("by text: Add To Your Collection") click()
And  I confirm the alert message
$("By.xpath: //*[text()='Author : ']") should be(visible)
And  I click Back To Book Store button
Then  I am on the Book Store Page
When  I click the "Designing Evolvable Web APIs with ASP.NET" Title Link
Then  I am on the Profile Book Detailed Information Page
And  I see the detailed information about "Designing Evolvable Web APIs with ASP.NET" book
When  I click the Add To Your Collection button
And  I confirm the alert message
And  I follow the Profile link on the Sidebar
Then  I see the "Git Pocket Guide" book in User`s collection
And  I see the "Designing Evolvable Web APIs with ASP.NET" book in User`s collection
And  I see that there are only two books in User`s collection
When  I click Delete All Books button
And  I confirm the alert delete message
Then  I see the Profile Book Catalog empty
$("webdriver") close()

fullName: Add and delete all books: Add one book to the User`s Profile
